catalog_info.title: Tutorial - Junior Year
catalog_info.notes:
Successful completion of one term of Romance Studies 98 (or equivalent) is required of all thesis-track honors concentrators in Romance Studies in their junior year.
This course is taught by members of the Department.
catalog_info.description: Weekly individual instruction for juniors pursuing a thesis honors track in Romance Studies, culminating in the writing of a 20-25 page research paper in a Romance language.
